lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,1,511847269,Mobilly,CityCredit LLC,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/mobilly/id511847269?uo=4,0.0,4.47703,2329,Finance,"Ar Mobilly Tu vari:
- Apmaksāt stāvvietas Rīgā, Liepājā, Daugavpilī un citās pilsētās, kā arī lielākajās pilsētās Igaunijā
- Apmaksāt elektroauto uzlādi visā Baltijā un visos lielākajos uzlādes tīklos Latvijā
- Iegādāties Rīgas sabiedriskā transporta koda biļetes. Ērti plāno braucienus izmantojot reālā laika karti un transporta kustību sarakstus
- Iegādāties starppilsētu vilcienu un autobusu biļetes
- Norēķināties Puto automazgātavās
- Apmaksāt iebraukšanas maksu Jūrmalā
- Iegādāties muzeju biļetes, ziedot un apmaksāt citus pakalpojumus
Kāpēc izvēlēties Mobilly?
Aizmirsti par sīknaudas skaitīšanu, stāvēšanu rindās vai gaidāmā stāvvietas ilguma
rēķināšanu! Ar Mobilly viss ir ātri, vienkārši un saprotami – no stāvvietu apmaksas
līdz auto uzlādei un sabiedriskā transporta plānošanai.
Kā lietot Mobilly?
1. Lejupielādē lietotni
2. Ievadi savu telefona numuru
3. Papildini savu Mobilly kontu
4. Sāc izmantot!
Mobilly lietotni var izmantot privātpersonas un uzņēmumi, un tā pieejama ar Eiropas Savienības, Lielbritānijas, Norvēģijas, Šveices, Islandes un Ukrainas tālruņa numuriem.
Lietotnei nepieciešams interneta pieslēgums.
Uzzini vairāk par Mobilly iespējām un priekšrocībām www.mobilly.lv
With Mobilly you can:
- Pay for parking in Rīga, Liepāja, Daugavpils and other cities in Latvia, as well as in major Estonian cities
- Pay for EV charging all across the Baltics and in all major charging networks in Latvia
- Buy digital tickets for Rīga public transport. Conveniently plan your journeys using real-time map and public transport schedules
- Buy regional train and bus tickets
- Pay at PUTO car washes
- Buy entry passes to Jūrmala
- Purchase tickets to museums and pay for other services.
Why choose Mobilly?

You no longer need to carry small cash, wait in line or try to calculate parking time limits! Mobilly makes it fast, easy and simple – from paying for parking to vehicle charging and planning your journey on public transport.
How to use Mobilly?
1. Download the app
2. Enter your phone number
3. Top up your Mobilly account
4. Start using!
The Mobilly app is available to private individuals and companies and it works with phone numbers from the European Union, the United Kingdom, Norway, Switzerland, Iceland, and Ukraine.
Internet connection is required to use the app.
Learn more about the possibilities and advantages of Mobilly at www.mobilly.lv!",2012-03-27T20:07:20Z,2025-09-02T15:08:01Z

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,2,932493382,Revolut - Mobile Finance,Revolut Ltd,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/revolut-mobile-finance/id932493382?uo=4,0.0,4.90161,35176,Finance,"Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.
This description is relevant for UK residents only.
Make your spend, well-spent
- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way
Send money near, far, wherever they are
- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension
Save the interest-ing way
- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying
Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)
- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend
- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).
Unlock security features that you control
- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money
How we protect your money
- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.",2015-03-01T14:54:14Z,2025-11-20T16:41:08Z
lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,3,476006496,Luminor Latvija,Luminor Bank AB,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/luminor-latvija/id476006496?uo=4,0.0,1.56389,493,Finance,"Tava banka Tavā telefonā!

Izmēģiniet Luminor mobilo aplikāciju un novērtējiet iespēju ērti, ātri un vienkārši lietot internetbanku mobilajā telefonā! Ar Luminor mobilo aplikāciju varēsiet lietot internetbankā biežāk izmantotās funkcijas, kā arī dažādus papildu rīkus ērtākai ikdienai.
Izmantojiet Ātro piekļuvi un ātri un droši pieslēdzies mobilajai bankai ar vienkāršu, paša izdomātu PIN kodu.
Ar Ātro piekļuvi varēsiet:
• Apskatīt viena vai vairāku kontu kopējo atlikumu
• Ātri un ērti veikt maksājumus iepriekš izvēlētiem saņēmējiem līdz 300 EUR (1000 EUR dienā)
• Apskatīt pēdējos 10 veiktos/saņemtos maksājumus
• Nosūtīt savu konta numuru uz e-pastu (savus rekvizītus)

Autorizējoties ierastajā veidā, izmantojot kalkulatoru/ Smart ID/ eParaksts mobile ierastajā veidā, jūs varēsiet apskatīt visu informāciju par kontiem un kartēm, veikt maksājumus jauniem saņēmējiem, apskatīt maksājumu vēsturi un apstiprināt sagatavotos un daļēji parakstītos maksājumus.
Būtiski uzņēmumiem – pieslēdzot automātiskos paziņojumus, saņemsiet paziņojumus, kad nepieciešams apstiprināt maksājumu.
Mobilās bankas aplikācijā jūs varēsiet arī aprēķināt valūtas kursu, apskatīt tuvāko ceļu līdz bankai, kā arī nepieciešamības gadījumā sazināties ar banku.
https://www.luminor.lv/lv/privatpersonam/mobila-banka
[ENG]
Your bank in your phone!

Try Luminor mobile application and enjoy the power of convenient, fast and easy online banking in the mobile phone! The most popular online banking functions and a whole variety of additional tools – all in one Luminor mobile application!
Use Quick Access and connect to online banking quickly and securely with a simple, self-created PIN code.
With Quick Access you can:
• View total balance of one or more accounts.
• Quickly and conveniently make payments to pre-selected beneficiaries up to 300 EUR (1000 EUR per day).
• View available balances of all accounts.
• View the last 10 made/received payments.
• Send the info about your account number by e-mail.

After authorization with the help of a code calculator or Smart ID/eParaksts mobile you will be able to view all the information about accounts and cards, make payments to the new beneficiary, view the payment history and confirm prepared and partially subscribed payments.
Important for the businesses – by enabling Push notifications you will receive notifications when there is a payment request for approval.
This useful mobile banking application will calculate the exchange rate, show the nearest way to the bank and, if necessary, will help you contact the bank!
https://luminor.lv/en/private/mobile-banking
RUS
Ваш банк в вашем телефоне!

Попробуйте мобильное приложение Luminor, которое позволит удобно, быстро и эффективно пользоваться интернет-банком в вашем мобильном телефоне. В мобильном приложении Luminor доступны наиболее часто используемые функции интернет-банка, а также различные дополнительные инструменты для удобства повседневной жизни.
Используйте Быстрый доступ для быстрого и безопасного подключения к мобильному банку с помощью простого, придуманного вами PIN-кода.
С помощью Быстрого доступа вы сможете:
• просматривать остаток своих счетов
• быстро и удобно совершать платежи предварительно выбранным получателям на сумму до 300 EUR (1000 EUR в день)
• просматривать последние 10 входящих и исходящих платежей
• отправлять свои банковские реквизиты по электронной почте.

После авторизации с помощью калькулятора кодов, Smart-ID или eParaksts mobile вы сможете просматривать всю информацию о расчетных счетах и картах, совершать платежи новым получателям, просматривать историю платежей и подтверждать подготовленные и частично подписанные платежи.
Важно для предприятий – подключив автоматические уведомления, вы будете получать уведомления о платежах, которые необходимо подтвердить.
https://www.luminor.lv/ru/chastnym-licam/mobilnyy-bank",2011-11-11T12:00:42Z,2025-11-17T09:52:07Z

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,4,283646709,"PayPal - Send, Manage, Pay","PayPal, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/paypal-send-manage-pay/id283646709?uo=4,0.0,4.78897,3957,Finance,"There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal
SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure
ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​

*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.
MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​

Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply
BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing
SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply
MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​

Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place.
POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply
PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**

*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions
PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790)
column2: in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405)
column3: and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD",2019-02-03T08:00:00Z,2025-11-17T16:24:16Z

column1: lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,5,434819156,Swedbank Latvija,Swedbank AS,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/swedbank-latvija/id434819156?uo=4,0.0,4.85559,1655,Finance,"Mūsu lietotnē vari ērti pārvaldīt savas ikdienas finanses:
- Apskatīt konta atlikumu un izrakstus.
- Nokopēt savu konta numuru, nospiežot uz tā.
- Izvēlēties dažādus maksājumu veidus, tostarp starptautiskos maksājumus.
- Izmantot e-makus, piemēram Apple Pay.
- Apstiprināt maksājumus, izmantojot biometriju, lietotnes PIN kodu,
Smart-ID u. c.
- Pārvaldīt kartes: apskatīt kartes datus un PIN kodu, mainīt limitus. Ja nepieciešams, vari bloķēt karti vai pasūtīt jaunu.
- Piekļūt pakalpojumiem: aizdevumiem, apdrošināšanai, pensijai, ieguldījumiem un uzkrājumiem.
- Saņemt paziņojumus, mainīt lietotnes izskatu uz tumšo režīmu un redzēt konta atlikumu logrīkā.
- Apskatīt priekšrocības, ja esi Jauniešu, Zelta apkalpošanas vai citas programmas dalībnieks.
- Sekot līdzi saviem tēriņiem rīkā “Mans budžets”.
- Sākt uzkrāt ar Krājrīku vai ieguldīt ar risinājumu Mikroieguldījums.
- Ja esi biznesa klients ‒ pārvaldīt savu Mini termināli (mPOS), sūtīt naudas pieprasījumus u. c.
Drošība
Vienmēr aizsargā savu ierīci, bloķējot ekrānu. Nesaglabā citu personu biometriskos datus savā ierīcē.
Personas datu apstrāde
Rūpes par personas datu integritāti ir mūsu prioritāte. Kāpēc un kādus personas datus mēs vācam, kā tos izmantojam un kā tos vari kontrolēt var uzzināt  www.swedbank.lv.
You can do all your everyday banking through our app:
- View your account balance and statement.
- Tap on your account number to copy it easily.
- Choose from various transfer types, including international payments.
- Use digital wallets like Apple Pay.
- Confirm payments however you choose – with biometrics, app PIN, Smart-ID, etc.
- Manage your cards: access details, check PIN code, change limits. If needed, block a card or order a new one.
- Access your services: loans, insurance, pension, investments and savings.
- Get app notifications, switch to dark mode and view balance in the widget.
- Check your benefits as a member of Youth, Gold or another program.
- Track your finances in My Budget tool.
- Start saving with Easy Saver and investing with Micro Invest.
- As a business customer, manage the Smart Terminal, send money request, etc.
Safety & Security
Always protect your device with a screen lock. Do not store anyone else’s biometric data on your device.
Processing of Personal Data
Protecting the integrity of personal data is a top priority for us. To know why and what personal data we collect, how we use it, and what control you have over it see on our website swedbank.lv.
В приложении Вы можете легко управлять своими финансами:
- Проверять баланс и выписки со счетов.
- Копировать номер счёта, нажав на него.
- Делать различные виды переводов, в т. ч. международные платежи.
- Платить с помощью э-кошельков, например, через Apple Pay.
- Подтверждать платежи удобным способом – используя биометрию, PIN-код, Smart-ID и т. д.
-  Управлять картами: просматривать данные карт, проверять PIN-код, менять лимиты. При необходимости можете заблокировать карту и заказать новую.
- Иметь доступ к услугам: кредитам, страхованию, пенсии, инвестициям и накоплениям.
- Получать уведомления приложения, переключаться на тёмный режим и проверять остаток счёта в виджете.
- Изучать преимущества своей клиентской программы.
- Следить за своими финансами с помощью решения «Мой бюджет».
- Откладывать деньги с Накопителем и инвестировать через Микроинвестиции.
- Как бизнес-клиент управлять своим Смарт-терминалом, отправлять запросы денег и т. д.
Безопасность
Всегда защищайте своё устройство, блокируя экран. Не храните биометрические данные других лиц в своём устройстве.
Обработка персональных данных

Забота об интегрированности ваших персональных данных – наш приоритет. Мы хотим, чтобы вы знали, почему и какие персональные данные мы собираем, как их используем и как вы можете их контролировать. Подробнее – на www.swedbank.lv.",2011-07-24T06:51:39Z,2025-10-22T11:13:43Z

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,6,612261027,Wise - Global Money,Wise Payments Ltd,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/wise-global-money/id612261027?uo=4,0.0,4.82531,3246,Finance,"16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.
— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics
— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details
— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction
— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts
— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed
— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more
Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Send from: GBP (British pound), EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), AUD (Australian dollar), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), JPY (Japanese yen), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (New Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar)

Send to: EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), GBP (British pound), AED (UAE dirham), ARS (Argentine peso), AUD (Australian dollar), BDT (Bangladeshi taka), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CLP (Chilean peso), CNY (Chinese yuan), CRC (Costa Rican colón), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), EGP (Egyptian pound), GHS (Ghanaian cedi), GEL (Georgian lari), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), IDR (Indonesian rupiah), ILS (Israeli shekel), INR (Indian rupee), JPY (Japanese yen), KES (Kenyan shilling), KRW (South Korean won), LKR (Sri Lankan rupee), MAD (Moroccan dirham), MXN (Mexican peso), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NPR (Nepalese rupee), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PEN (Peruvian sol), PHP (Philippine peso), PKR (Pakistan rupee), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar), THB (Thai baht), TRY (Turkish lira), UAH (Ukrainian hryvnia), VND (Vietnamese dong), ZAR (South African rand), ZMW (Zambian kwacha)

Capital at risk. Past performance does not guarantee future growth. Interest is an investment service, availability and provider vary by location. Please check Wise.com/interest for more information.",2013-10-04T07:00:00Z,2025-11-24T10:02:58Z

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,7,1475076952,BALTA,BALTA AAS,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/balta/id1475076952?uo=4,0.0,3.47458,59,Finance,"BALTA mobilā lietotne ir vienkāršākais, ērtākais un ātrākais veids, kā izmantot BALTA pašapkalpošanās iespējas!
Ja Tev ir BALTA veselības apdrošināšana:
• izmanto veselības apdrošināšanas bezkontakta e-karti,
• piesaki atlīdzību par sevi vai citu apdrošināto personu,
• apskati un seko līdzi atlīdzību pieteikumiem,
• saņem paziņojumus par pieņemto lēmumu,
• ja nepieciešams, pievieno papildu informāciju.
Tāpat BALTA mobilajā lietotnē vari:
• ātri un ērti iegādāties apdrošināšanas pakalpojumus,
• pieteikt atlīdzību citos apdrošināšanas veidos,
• aplūkot aktuālo informāciju, piemēram, polises, rēķinus, atlīdzību lietas u. c.

Uzsākot BALTA lietotnes izmantošanu, Tev būs jāautorizējas ar savu internetbanku, kā arī jāizveido PIN kods, ko vēlāk varēsi aizstāt ar biometrisko autentifikāciju (Touch ID, Face ID), lai ātrāk un ērtāk piekļūtu savai informācijai.",2019-12-16T08:00:00Z,2025-09-30T08:49:36Z

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,8,1532397813,BCMC,Teknowledge Software,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/bcmc/id1532397813?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Finance,"The official app of the Baltic Capital Markets Conference 2025 — the annual largest capital market event in the Baltic States, bringing together leading industry professionals, investment specialists and regulators from Latvia, Lithuania and Estonia, as well as international experts.

Taking place in Riga, Latvia, the conference unites leading voices from across the financial ecosystem for one dynamic day of discussion, case studies, presentation and networking. Whether you are a returning participant or a first-time attendee, the BCMC 2025 app is your essential digital companion — designed to help you navigate the conference, connect with peers, and get the most out of your experience.
Personalized Agenda

Personalize agenda - Build your own conference schedule and keep track of sessions, panels, and presentations that matter most to you. Add sessions to your favorites and stay organized throughout the event.
Speaker Insights - Get to know this year’s thought leaders — from leading policymakers and institutional investors to innovative company executives. Access bios, session details in one place.
Networking Made Simple - Connect with other attendees using the app’s built-in networking tools. Send messages and schedule one-on-one meetings directly through the platform.
Live Updates & Announcements - Stay informed in real time. Receive instant notifications about agenda changes, speaker additions, and important announcements from the conference organizers.
Engage & Participate - Join the conversation! Ask questions during live sessions and share feedback instantly. Your participation helps shape the dialogue that drives regional market growth.
Sponsors and Company stands - Explore the profiles of sponsors and corporate partners powering the event.
Event Highlights - Relive the best moments from BCMC 2025 through photos.",2020-09-25T07:00:00Z,2025-11-12T21:59:10Z

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,9,1667836539,INDEXO Banka,INDEXO Banka AS,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/indexo-banka/id1667836539?uo=4,0.0,3.91453,234,Finance,"Pēc reģistrācijas INDEXO Bankā nokļūsi bezmaksas plānā Sudrabs, kur banka maksā tev, nevis otrādi.
LATVIJĀ RADĪTA BANKA, KAS PĀRSTĀV VIETĒJO INTERESES

Akcionāri ir tūkstošiem Latvijas iedzīvotāju. Mūsu fokuss ir uz vietējo vajadzībām, lēmumus pieņemam lokāli, neatkarīgi un ātri. Izmantojam jaunākās tehnoloģijas un labākos risinājumus, kādi zināmi pasaules banku sektorā, lai mūsu banka būtu tieši tāda, kādu vajag Latvijā šeit un tagad.
PELNI AR KATRU EIRO, KO TURI KONTĀ
Te pelna pat konta atlikums. Pie mums ir arī ienesīgas krājkases un izdevīgi termiņnoguldījumi. Lejupielādē, reģistrējies un atver kontu bez maksas pāris minūtēs!
AUDZĒ NAUDU IENESĪGĀS KRĀJKASĒS
Tava nauda krājkasē ne tikai krājas, bet arī pelna ienesīgus procentus. Noapaļo ar karti veiktos pirkumus un krāj vēl vieglāk.
PĀRBAUDI VAI NEPĀRMAKSĀ PAR MĀJOKĻA KREDĪTU

Dažu minūšu laikā uzzini, vai un cik pārmaksā par mājokļa kredītu, kā arī to, cik vari saņemt papildus remontam vai citām vajadzībām! No pieteikuma līdz aizdevuma saņemšanai – viss mobilajā  lietotnē.
UZZINI SAVAS KREDĪTIESPĒJAS
Mūsu klienti aizdevuma pieteikuma procesu vērtē ar 4,4 no 5 un raksturo to, kā ātru, ērtu un vienkārši saprotamu. No pieteikuma līdz naudai kontā vien 5 minūtes.
APSKATI PENSIJU 2. LĪMENI
Tagad ikviens savu pensiju 2. līmeņa uzkrājumu, iemaksas un peļņu var ērti un ātri apskatīt INDEXO Bankas mobilajā lietotnē. Iespējams, esi bagātāks nekā domā – pārbaudi pats!
PĀRVALDI PENSIJU 3. LĪMENI
Veic iemaksas, uzstādi regulāro maksājumu, seko līdzi rezultātiem un maini ieguldījumu sadalījumu. Dari visu ātri, ērti un vienuviet – aplikācijā.
Lietotne pieejama Latvijas pilsoņiem un rezidentiem. Lejupielādē to Eiropas Savienības valstīs, kā arī ASV un Lielbritānijā.",2024-08-27T07:00:00Z,2025-10-20T11:55:08Z

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,10,531306865,SEB Latvia,Skandinaviska Enskilda Banken AB,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/seb-latvia/id531306865?uo=4,0.0,3.65714,1155,Finance,"App is now available for private and business customers.
Private customers can:
•quickly check account balance(s)
•see the list of latest transactions
•log in using a four-digit PIN code or fingerprint authentication
•transfer up to EUR 30 without any additional passwords
•transfer money between accounts or to people on his telephone’s contact list
•request other app users to make a payment
•find your templates or use autosuggest function (based on your previous transaction history)
Business customers can:
•quickly check account balance(s)
•see the list of latest transactions
•confirm payments
•log in using a four-digit PIN code or fingerprint authentication
•transfer money between accounts
The app is updated on regular basis and new functions are added.
PRIVACY AND SECURITY

When user registers into the app, he agrees to comply with the service terms and assigns the selected phone number with the specified account. It is necessary to note that during this process the indicated phone number is encoded and sent to the bank in the form of a sequence of encoded characters, that means that the bank does not collect or keep your phone number or data of other customers available on your phone contact list. Only such users of the app, who have saved your phone number in their contact list, may see that you are a user of the SEB mobile application.

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,11,1492997398,Seesam Health Latvia,Seesam Insurance AS Latvijas filiale,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/seesam-health-latvia/id1492997398?uo=4,0.0,3.37838,37,Finance,"Seesam lietotne ir ērtākais veids, kā izmantot veselības apdrošināšanu Latvijā, lietojot viedtālruni vai planšeti.
Ar iespējām, ko sniedz Seesam lietotne ērti var:
* iepazīties ar pieejamo veselības apdrošināšanas programmu un tās limitiem
* medicīnas iestādēs saņemt veselības aprūpes pakalpojumus uzrādot elektronisko (nevis plastikāta) veselības apdrošināšanas karti
* iesniegt čekus un citus ar veselības apdrošināšanas atlīdzību saistītus dokumentus
* līdzsekot atlīdzību regulēšanas gaitai un vajadzības gadījumā pievienot papildu dokumentus.
Reģistrēšanās pirms uzsākt izmantot Seesam lietotni ir vienkārša un aizņems vien dažas minūtes laika. Pievienojies!
Приложение Seesam — это самый удобный способ использования медицинской страховки в Латвии с помощью смартфона или планшета.
Приложение Seesam, позволит быстро и удобно:
* ознакомиться с индивидуальной программой медицинского страхования и ее лимитами
* получить медицинскую помощь в медицинских учреждениях, предъявив электронную (не пластиковую) карточку страхования здоровья
* подать чеки и другие документы, касающиеся страховых случаев, чтобы получить страховое возмещение
* следить за процессом регулирования страхового возмещения и, при необходимости, добавить дополнительную документацию.
Простой и быстрый процесс регистрации перед использованием приложения Seesam займет всего несколько минут. Подключайтесь!
Seesam application is the most convenient way to use health insurance in Latvia using your smartphone.
With the features provided by the Seesam application you can conveniently:
* get acquainted with your individual health insurance program and its limits
* receive medical treatment at medical institutions by presenting an electronic (not plastic) health insurance card
* report a claim: submit checks and other documents relating to health insurance claims
* keep track of the claim regulaton process and add additional documentation if necessary.
Signing in to Seesam application is easy and will only take a few minutes. Join in!",2020-01-07T08:00:00Z,2025-11-19T09:29:49Z

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,12,495139240,Citadele Bank,AS Citadele banka,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/citadele-bank/id495139240?uo=4,0.0,4.80561,7269,Finance,"Mobile banking has never been so simple and convenient!
Become a customer in just 7 minutes and choose the right card for your needs:
- Citadele smart: enjoy free transfers and cash withdrawals from ATMs worldwide
- Citadele supreme: enjoy everyday benefits as well as insurance for your purchases and travels
- Citadele prime: receive all our everyday benefits, plus extensive insurance for you and your family
In mobile app, you can:
- Authorize and approve payments using biometrics
- Make payments up to EUR 10 000
- Block and unblock cards and change their PIN codes
- Enjoy other benefits of the app – try it!
App is available for Citadele Bank customers in Latvia, Lithuania and Estonia.

Customers in Latvia who have activated MobileSCAN authorization device and/or Quick balance on your mobile application, in case of loss/theft of the mobile device, should immediately call (+371) 67010000 to block these functions.
More information: www.citadele.lv, www.citadele.lt and www.citadele.ee
Feedback and suggestions are welcome to mobileapp@citadele.lv!
This mobile application is developed by AS “Citadele banka” (reg. No. 40103303559) for the usage of bank’s most popular daily banking services on mobile devices.
Bankas pakalpojumi mobilajā ierīcē nekad vēl nav bijuši tik ērti un vienkārši!
Kļūsti par klientu 7 minūtēs un izvēlies sev piemērotāko no kartēm:
- Citadele smart: pārskaiti un izņem naudu no jebkura bankomāta visā pasaulē bez maksas
- Citadele supreme: izbaudi ikdienas priekšrocības, kā arī tavu pirkumu un ceļojumu apdrošināšanu
- Citadele prime: saņem visas ikdienas priekšrocības, turklāt plašu apdrošināšanu tev un ģimenei
Mobilajā lietotnē vari:
- Autorizēties un apstiprināt maksājumus ar biometriju
- Veikt maksājumus eiro līdz 10 000 EUR
- Bloķēt un atbloķēt kartes, kā arī mainīt to PIN kodus
- Izmantot daudzas citas lietotnes priekšrocības – pamēģini!
Vairāk informācijas: www.citadele.lv
Ja tev ir aktivizēts MobileSCAN un/vai kāda no mobilās lietotnes Ātrajām funkcijām, mobilās ierīces pazaudēšanas/nozagšanas gadījumā nekavējoties zvani (+371) 67010000, lai bloķētu šīs funkcijas.
Atsauksmes un ierosinājumus sūti uz mobileapp@citadele.lv!
Mobilioji bankininkystė dar niekada nebuvo tokia paprasta ir patogi!
Tapk klientu vos per 7 minutes ir išsirink sau labiausiai tinkamą kortelę:

-„Citadele smart“: atlik nemokamus mokėjimus eurais Lietuvoje ir Europoje bei išsigrynink iki 750 EUR be komisinio mokesčio bankomatuose visame pasaulyje (gali būti taikomi bankomatų savininkų mokesčiai).
-„Citadele supreme“: naudokis kasdieniais privalumais, papildomai gauk pirkinių ir kelionių draudimą*.
-„Citadele prime“: naudokis visais kasdieniais privalumais ir dar geresniu draudimo* pasiūlymu tau ir kartu keliaujančiai tavo šeimai.
Mobiliojoje banko programėlėje gali:
- atlikti mokėjimus iki 10 000 EUR
- patvirtinti mokėjimus biometriniais duomenimis
- užblokuoti ir atblokuoti korteles, pakeisti jų PIN kodus
- išbandyk programėlę ir atrask kitus jos privalumus!
Programėle gali naudotis „Citadele“ banko klientai Lietuvoje, Latvijoje ir Estijoje.
Daugiau informacijos: www.citadele.lt
Tavo vertinimų ir pasiūlymų laukiame el.p. mobileapp@citadele.lv
Mobiilipangandus pole kunagi olnud nii lihtne ja mugav!
Tule kliendiks pangakontorisse tulemata ja vali oma vajadustele sobiv kaart:
- Citadele smart: tee ülekandeid ja võta sularaha teenustasuta mis tahes pangaautomaadist kogu maailmas
- Citadele supreme: saa igapäevaseid eeliseid ning kindlustust oma ostude ja reiside ees
- Citadele prime: naudi kõiki meie igapäevaseid eeliseid ning lisaks ulatuslikku kindlustust sulle ja sinu perele
Mobiiliäpis sa saad:
- Autoriseerida ja kinnitada makseid kasutades biomeetriat
- Teha makseid kuni 10 000 EUR
- Blokeerida ja vabastada blokist kaarte ning muuta nende PIN-koode
- Naudi teisi äpi eeliseid – proovi järele!
Loe lisaks: www.citadele.ee
Tagasiside ja ettepanekud saada mobileapp@citadele.lv!",2012-02-21T08:00:00Z,2025-10-03T16:21:49Z

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,13,1478088453,Mans BTA,BTA Baltic Insurance Company,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/mans-bta/id1478088453?uo=4,0.0,4.14634,82,Finance,"Mans BTA mobilā lietotne saviem klientiem piedāvā:

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,14,1481947260,Kraken: Buy Bitcoin & Crypto,"Payward, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/kraken-buy-bitcoin-crypto/id1481947260?uo=4,0.0,4.76743,86,Finance,"Kraken is the easy, safe and secure way to buy and sell bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, now available in a simple, on-the-go app for investing and managing your account.

At the forefront of the Bitcoin revolution since 2011, Kraken is one of the largest and oldest Bitcoin exchanges in the world. Millions of clients around the world trust Kraken to buy and sell cryptocurrencies.

Whether you’re a crypto-beginner or an advanced trader, Kraken gives you the power to chart your own financial course, thanks to our excellent service, handy tools, low fees, versatile funding options and rigorous security standards.

Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. Take 2 mins to learn more at https://www.kraken.com/legal/uk/disclaimer
CRYPTO INVESTING MADE SIMPLE
• Easily buy and sell the most popular cryptocurrencies
• Low fees for buy/sell orders
• Know the exact price before you buy/sell
• 24/7 support with a single tap to open a support ticket
EASILY BUY & SELL CRYPTO
• Scroll and tap to select the asset to buy/sell
• Preset amounts to create orders in a single tap
• Simple form for custom orders
• Get an exact price quote before you buy or sell
• Review your past transactions
• See your available balance for buying
• Buy crypto in fixed amounts over time to benefit from dollar-cost averaging (DCA)
TRACK YOUR CRYPTO PORTFOLIO
• Simple graphic showing your investment allocation and total balance
• Easily review the value of each investment and its % of your portfolio
• See portfolio performance over time with your customized portfolio chart
• Quickly adjust your portfolio with a tap to buy or sell
• Review transaction history for each investment
PAY USING YOUR CRYPTO
• Send money fast to any Kraken user, anywhere
• Zero fees for all payments, worldwide
• 300+ different currencies (government and crypto)
• Claim your unique @kraktag
SUBSCRIBE TO MORE TRADES, LESS FEES
• Meet our premium subscription service for £4.99/mo
• Kraken+ gives you zero trading fees, up to £10k/month
• Earn boosted up to 4%+ APR on USDG
HUNDREDS OF CRYPTOCURRENCIES AVAILABLE
We have one of the largest selections of assets to buy and sell, including:
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Dogecoin (DOGE), Litecoin (LTC), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Monero (XMR), EOS, Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), TRON (TRX), Stellar (XLM) and many more.
Cryptocurrencies are unregulated in the UK, profits may be subject to capital gains tax, and the value of cryptocurrencies can go down or up.

Geographic restrictions apply. Instant buy/sell fees apply when you convert one asset or currency to another when making a transfer. Please see our fee schedule for more information. Applicable fees will be shown before you make a transfer.
© Payward Interactive, Inc. 2024
NMLS ID 1843762, 106 E. Lincolnway, 4th Floor, Cheyenne, WY 82001
Terms of Service:
www.kraken.com/legal

Kraken+ is an automatically renewing subscription requiring recurring payments. Cancel anytime. Price is inclusive of applicable taxes (i.e., VAT) where required. In other regions, the price shown does not include taxes, which will be added at the time of purchase where applicable. Subscription benefits vary by region and may be modified by Kraken at any time upon notice. Spread and payment processing fees still apply. Boosted USDG Rewards, including the Rewards rate, is subject to change and is not available in all regions.",2020-11-12T08:00:00Z,2025-11-18T18:16:44Z

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,19,1484316366,myTU - Mobile Banking,Travel Union UAB,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/mytu-mobile-banking/id1484316366?uo=4,0.0,4.64655,232,Finance,"myTU is a versatile mobile banking app designed for convenience, speed, and security for both personal and business use. Our highly secure, purpose-driven mobile banking platform offers feature-rich solutions for your everyday banking needs.
Registering for myTU is free, and you can easily order a debit card. We only charge a monthly fee when you order a debit card. For detailed pricing information, please visit mytu.co
Who can use myTU?
- Individuals
- Businesses
- Kids aged 7+
Benefits:
- Obtain a European IBAN within minutes.
- It's easy to create a myTU account without going anywhere. All you need is your ID/Passport for legal verification and for kids, a birth certificate is required additionally.
- Make payments, receive payments, and save money in just a few taps. With SEPA Instant transfers, fund transfers take place instantly without any transaction fees.
myTU Visa Debit Card:
- Make payments easily with the contactless Visa debit card. It comes in two elegant colours – pick your preferred colour and order it in the app straight to your home.
- Access ATMs worldwide for free cash withdrawals up to €200 per month or twice a month.
- When you travel overseas, you can easily withdraw cash or pay for goods and services without any commissions.
- myTU Visa debit card is the perfect travel companion saving you hundreds of euros in commissions.
- Our Visa debit card features robust security. If your card is lost, lock it instantly in the app for added safety, and unlock it with a single tap.
Made for Kids:
- Every child who signs up on myTU gets a 10€ gift from us.
- Kids aged 7 and above can start using myTU. myTU for Kids help parents and children manage money easily – making sending pocket money really easy for parents.
- Kids receive their stylish payment card.
- Parents can track kids' spending with instant notifications.
For Businesses:
- myTU for Business offers not only mobile banking but also internet banking functionalities, ensuring you can manage your money on the go.
- Instant SEPA transaction settlements make a business banking account at myTU the ideal choice for many businesses.
- Get paid quickly and send money transfers promptly without the bureaucracy of traditional banks, and at lower fees.
myTU is available in all EU/EEA countries.

Accounts can be opened for citizens of EU/EEA. If you're a temporary residence permit holder, it is possible to create an account with myTU by providing proof of the necessary documents for legal requirements.

myTU is a licensed Electronic Money Institution (EMI) registered with the Bank of Lithuania. Customers' deposits are held securely in the central bank. So you can rest assured that your money is safe.",2020-06-16T07:00:00Z,2025-10-06T16:45:35Z

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,21,1550264875,Banknote,DelfinGroup SIA,https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/banknote/id1550264875?uo=4,0.0,4.7649,604,Finance,"Banknote - aizdevumi, kas atbilst Jūsu maksātspējai un īstenojamajām vēlmēm.
Banknote piedāvā aizdevumus no 100 EUR līdz 10000 EUR ar apmaksas termiņu no 3 mēnešiem līdz pat 5 gadiem.
Lielākajā daļā gadījumu lēmums par aizdevuma piešķiršanu tiek pieņemts 5 minūšu laikā, bet aizdevuma summa izmaksāta 15 minūšu laikā pēc līguma apstiprināšanas.
Pirmajam Banknote aizdevumam tiek piemērota 100% atlaide procentu maksai, ja visa aizdevuma summa tiek atmaksāta līdz pirmajam maksājuma datumam. Banknote piedāvā īpašas atlaides arī senioriem.
Banknote Jums piedāvā:
1. Vienkāršu un ērtu pieteikšanās procesu bez garām anketām un dokumentu pievienošanas
2. Ātru aizdevuma pieteikuma izskatīšanu un aizdevuma izmaksu
3. Iespēju nesteidzīgi iepazīties ar aizdevuma līgumu pirms tā apstiprināšanas
4. Iespēju saņemt papildu aizdevuma summas no 20 EUR
5. Laipnu un profesionālu klientu apkalpošanas servisu Jums ērtākajā veidā - telefoniski, e-pastā, Whatsapp vai jebkurā Banknote filiālē.

Lai padarītu Banknote pakalpojumus vēl pieejamākus, piedāvājam Jums mobilo aplikāciju, kurā varēsiet noformēt jaunu aizdevumu, apskatīt informāciju par esošajiem aizdevuma līgumiem, veikt aktuālos maksājumus, atrast sev tuvāko Banknote filiāli un veikt citas ierastās darbības ērtāk nekā līdz šim.",2021-07-25T07:00:00Z,2025-10-23T08:14:34Z

lv,Latvia,Finance,6015,24,1205990992,TradingView: Track All Markets,"TradingView, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/lv/app/tradingview-track-all-markets/id1205990992?uo=4,0.0,4.89595,1086,Finance,"In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set:
World-leading charts

A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.
Simple Pine Script for complex tools

From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.
Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.
Unmissable alerts
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.
Made to trade
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.
One app to track them all

Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.
Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.
Watchlist what matters

Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be.
Data. Data. Data,

Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.
Never trade alone again

Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.
Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.
Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/

TRADING
